issue_title: Test Issue - Memory usage is too high
issue_body: When I open large files, the IDE uses too much memory and becomes slow.
draft_response:
Here is a draft response for the GitHub issue:

Hey there @testuser,

Thanks for reporting this issue with Coder1 IDE's memory usage. We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing performance issues when working with large files. This is definitely something we'll want to look into.

Could you please provide a bit more information to help us investigate further? Some details that would be helpful:

- What size/type of files are you typically working with?
- Are there any specific actions or workflows that seem to trigger the high memory usage?
- Are you running Coder1 on a particular operating system or hardware configuration?

Providing these details will really help our engineering team diagnose the problem and work towards a solution. In the meantime, you may want to try closing and reopening the IDE, or restarting your computer, to see if that provides any temporary relief.

We're committed to ensuring Coder1 delivers a smooth and efficient development experience, so please rest assured we'll investigate this issue thoroughly. We appreciate you taking the time to report it - feedback like this is invaluable for improving the product.

Please let me know if you have any other questions! I'm here to help.

Best regards,
[Your name]
Coder1 Community Manager
